Name: maximize_completed_user_stories
Description: Maximize number of user stories with status done

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Maximize positive velocity trend over sprints

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize total estimated effort of tasks in sprint backlog

Name: minimize_feature_cycle_time
Description: Minimize features with status not done (proxy for cycle time)

Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize available worker capacity during sprint

Name: minimize_budget_spend
Description: Minimize total project budget used (proxy via budget attribute)

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance_coverage
Description: Maximize coverage of features relevant to stakeholders

Name: maximize_review_feedback_documentation
Description: Maximize quality/amount of SR feedback documentation

Name: maximize_roadmap_objectives_alignment
Description: Maximize alignment of work with roadmap objectives
